an6.74:4.1: “Mendicants, without giving up these six qualities you can’t enter and remain in the second absorption.
an6.74:4.3: Sensual, malicious, and cruel thoughts and perceptions.
an6.74:4.4: Without giving up these six qualities you can’t enter and remain in the second absorption.
an6.74:5.1: But after giving up these six qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.
an6.74:5.3: Sensual, malicious, and cruel thoughts and perceptions.
an6.74:5.4: After giving up these six qualities you can enter and remain in the second absorption.”
